purpose: Provides prompt templates for LLM-based test generation, configuration analysis, and test planning strategies.
userVisibleActions: Analyzes codebase to recommend optimal test setup and configuration
Generates prioritized test plans identifying critical functions to test
Creates detailed test specifications for individual functions
Provides test implementation guidance with examples and patterns
Suggests mock requirements for external dependencies like VSCode APIs
developerVisibleActions: Developer calls buildSetupPrompt() to analyze workspace and get test framework recommendations
Developer calls buildPlanningPrompt() to create a prioritized test strategy based on code analysis
Developer calls buildTestSpecPrompt() to generate detailed test specifications for specific functions
Developer calls buildImplementationPrompt() to get test implementation guidance with code examples
Receives structured JSON responses with dependencies, configurations, and test strategies
Gets language detection, framework selection, and mock requirements automatically
Receives prioritized function lists with complexity scores and coverage recommendations

keyFunctions.name: buildSetupPrompt
keyFunctions.desc: Creates a prompt to analyze codebase and recommend test setup configuration
keyFunctions.inputs: workspaceRoot: string, fileList: string[], packageJsonContent?: string
keyFunctions.outputs: Prompt string requesting JSON with language, framework, dependencies, config files, and mock requirements

keyFunctions.name: buildPlanningPrompt
keyFunctions.desc: Generates a prompt to create a prioritized test plan based on code analysis
keyFunctions.inputs: context: CodeAnalysis, functions: any[], productDocs?: any, architectureInsights?: any
keyFunctions.outputs: Prompt string requesting JSON with prioritized functions, complexity scores, and testing strategy

keyFunctions.name: buildTestSpecPrompt
keyFunctions.desc: Creates a prompt to generate detailed test specifications for a specific function
keyFunctions.inputs: testableFunction: TestableFunction, codeContext: string, existingTests?: string
keyFunctions.outputs: Prompt string requesting JSON with test scenarios, edge cases, assertions, and mocking needs

keyFunctions.name: buildImplementationPrompt
keyFunctions.desc: Generates a prompt to provide test implementation guidance and code examples
keyFunctions.inputs: testSpec: any, framework: string, existingPatterns?: string
keyFunctions.outputs: Prompt string requesting JSON with implementation strategy, code examples, and best practices

intent: This file exists to standardize and structure LLM interactions for automated test generation. It solves the problem of consistently prompting LLMs to analyze code, plan test strategies, and generate test specifications by providing reusable prompt templates that request structured JSON responses. This enables automated test creation workflows where LLM recommendations can be programmatically processed and applied to codebases.
